title: Mojito
ingredients: Rum, Lime, Mint, Sugar, Soda Water
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add rum and soda water. Garnish with mint leaves and lime wedge.

title: Margarita
ingredients: Crushed Ice, Tequila, Triple Sec, Lime Juice
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into glass with salted rim. Garnish with lime wedge.

title: Bloody Mary
ingredients: Vodka, Tomato Juice, Lemon Juice, Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, Celery Salt, Pepper
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Garnish with celery stick.

title: Pina Colada
ingredients: Crushed Ice, Rum, Coconut Cream, Pineapple Juice
instructions: Blend ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with pineapple wedge.

title: Mimosa
instructions: Pour orange juice into glass. Top with champagne.

title: Mai Tai
ingredients: Crushed Ice, Rum, Triple Sec, Lime Juice, Orgeat Syrup
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Garnish with pineapple wedge.

title: Cosmopolitan
ingredients: Vodka, Triple Sec, Cranberry Juice, Lime Juice
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

title: Old Fashioned
ingredients: Bourbon, Sugar Cube, Angostura Bitters, Club Soda, Orange Slice, Cherry
instructions: Muddle sugar cube, bitters, and one splash of club soda. Add bourbon, ice cubes, and stir. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

title: Whiskey Sour
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Garnish with a cherry and lemon slice.

title: Tequila Sunrise
instructions: Pour tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add grenadine, which will sink to the bottom. Stir gently to create the sunrise effect.

title: Martini
ingredients: Gin or Vodka, Dry Vermouth, Lemon twist or Olive
instructions: Stir or shake ingredients with ice. Strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or olive.

title: Daiquiri
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
